today most of the islands have collapsed.
Now only an island of ruins remains floating in the void,
the experimental combat AI left behind are wondering around…</p></div></div></section><section class="section-4"><h3 class="section-heading">Freedom of movement in the VR space<span class="horizontal-line"></span></h3><div class="grid-container"><div class="grid-item"><p class="sub-description">Glide through the air using your glider or climb the walls of a fortress.
